Name: Open Fortran Parser
Version: 0.7.1
Description: The Open Fortran Parser (OFP) project provides ANTLR-based parsing tools that support the Fortran 2003 standard.
License: EPL-v10-open-fortran-parser
OSR: 13312
Origin: http://fortran-parser.sourceforge.net
Files: open-fortran-parser-0.7.1.2.zip
